summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1224 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 258.0m higher than yesterday, 609.9m lower than the past week, 1224.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1523.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2130m and 2750m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
